verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%>, A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah <S%H7141><s%>. LORD <S%H3068><s%>, thou hast been favourable <S%H7521><s%> unto thy land <S%H776><s%>: thou hast brought back <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> <S%H7622><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>. for the sons: or, of the sons favourable: or, well pleased
Thou hast forgiven <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%>, thou hast covered <S%H3680><s%> all their sin <S%H2403><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

Thou hast taken away <S%H622><s%> all thy wrath <S%H5678><s%>: thou hast turned <S%H7725><s%> thyself from the fierceness <S%H2740><s%> of thine anger <S%H639><s%>. thyself: or, thine anger from waxing hot
Turn <S%H7725><s%> us, O God <S%H430><s%> of our salvation <S%H3468><s%>, and cause thine anger <S%H3708><s%> toward us to cease <S%H6565><s%>.
Wilt thou be angry <S%H599><s%> with us for ever <S%H5769><s%>? wilt thou draw out <S%H4900><s%> thine anger <S%H639><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>?
Wilt thou not revive <S%H2421><s%> us again <S%H7725><s%>: that thy people <S%H5971><s%> may rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in thee?
Shew <S%H7200><s%> us thy mercy <S%H2617><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and grant <S%H5414><s%> us thy salvation <S%H3468><s%>.

I will hear <S%H8085><s%> what God <S%H410><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will speak <S%H1696><s%>: for he will speak <S%H1696><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>, and to his saints <S%H2623><s%>: but let them not turn again <S%H7725><s%> to folly <S%H3690><s%>.
Surely his salvation <S%H3468><s%> is nigh <S%H7138><s%> them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him; that glory <S%H3519><s%> may dwell <S%H7931><s%> in our land <S%H776><s%>.
Mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> are met together <S%H6298><s%>; righteousness <S%H6664><s%> and peace <S%H7965><s%> have kissed <S%H5401><s%> each other.
Truth <S%H571><s%> shall spring out <S%H6779><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; and righteousness <S%H6664><s%> shall look down <S%H8259><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
Yea, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> that which is good <S%H2896><s%>; and our land <S%H776><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> her increase <S%H2981><s%>.
Righteousness <S%H6664><s%> shall go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him; and shall set <S%H7760><s%> us in the way <S%H1870><s%> of his steps <S%H6471><s%>.
